statements: UPDATE FeedbackSurveys SET survey_rating = 4, survey_comment = 'Great service' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE FeedbackSurveys SET survey_comment = 'Could be better', survey_rating = 2 WHERE customer_id = '98765432-abcdef-1234-5678-abcdef987654';
UPDATE FeedbackSurveys SET survey_rating = 4, survey_comment = 'Good feedback' WHERE survey_id = 'c7d54a96-5a1d-4c5b-9d4e-7df1e3e914a8';
UPDATE FeedbackSurveys SET survey_date = '2022-09-15T10:30:00Z', customer_id = '2e423a98-14c2-4db1-b3ca-5644e910bd7a' WHERE survey_id = '7be3472b-08ec-4ff6-b8c8-ea1aa909946e';
UPDATE FeedbackSurveys SET satisfaction_level = 5 WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE SurveyResponses SET response_text = 'Great service, thank you!' WHERE survey_id = 2;
UPDATE FeedbackSurveys SET satisfaction_level = 5, comments = 'Great experience' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE SurveyResponses SET response_text = 'Thank you for your feedback' WHERE survey_id = 2;
UPDATE feedback_survey SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Excellent service!' WHERE feedback_id = 2;
UPDATE feedback_survey SET customer_name = 'John Doe', survey_date = '2021-08-15' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE support_response SET response_text = 'Thank you for your feedback! We are glad to hear your positive comments.' WHERE feedback_id = 3;
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Survey SET survey_description = 'Feedback survey for product improvement' WHERE survey_id = 2;
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Survey SET survey_description = 'Updated survey description' WHERE survey_id = 2;
UPDATE feedback_surveys SET feedback = 'Excellent feedback received!' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_responses SET response = 'Thank you for your valuable feedback!' WHERE response_id = 3;
UPDATE feedback_surveys SET feedback = 'Great service, very satisfied' WHERE survey_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201;
UPDATE customer_responses SET response = 'Thank you for your feedback' WHERE customer_id = 202 AND survey_id = 102;
